C

ClassModel - Class in org.microbean.freemarker
A BeanModel that permits additional operations from within a Freemarker template on Class objects.
ClassModel(Class<?>, BeansWrapper) - Constructor for class org.microbean.freemarker.ClassModel
Creates a new ClassModel.
ClassModelFactory - Class in org.microbean.freemarker
A ModelFactory that makes ClassModel instances.
ClassModelFactory() - Constructor for class org.microbean.freemarker.ClassModelFactory
Creates a new ClassModelFactory.
create(Object, ObjectWrapper) - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.ClassModelFactory
Creates a new ClassModel and returns it.

E

execute() - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
Executes the freemarker goal.

F

FlexibleObjectWrapper - Class in org.microbean.freemarker
A DefaultObjectWrapper that uses a Map of ModelFactory instances indexed by Class instances to assist in wrapping Objects.

Creates a new FlexibleObjectWrapper.
FlexibleObjectWrapper(DefaultObjectWrapperConfiguration, boolean, Map<? extends Class<?>, ? extends ModelFactory>) - Constructor for class org.microbean.freemarker.FlexibleObjectWrapper
Creates a new FlexibleObjectWrapper.
FlexibleObjectWrapper(Version, Map<? extends Class<?>, ? extends ModelFactory>) - Constructor for class org.microbean.freemarker.FlexibleObjectWrapper
Creates a new FlexibleObjectWrapper.

Generates a document from a Freemarker template.

Returns various TemplateModel implementations depending on the key passed.

getDefaultOutputFile(String) - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
Returns a File representing the default location for the output from the processing of a Freemarker template with the supplied templateName.
getJandexIndexFile() - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
Returns a File representing the path to a Jandex index file.
getModelFactories() - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
Returns a Map of the ModelFactory instances to be used by a BeansWrapper indexed by the names of the Classes to which they apply.
getModelFactory(Class) - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.FlexibleObjectWrapper
Returns a ModelFactory suitable for the supplied Class.
getOutputEncoding() - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
Returns the character encoding scheme used when writing the output File.
getOutputFile(String) - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
Returns a File representing the path where the output of processing a Freemarker template with the supplied templateName should be deposited.
getOutputFile() - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
Returns a File representing the full path to the file that will result from processing the template given by the templateName parameter.
getProject() - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
Returns the MavenProject in effect.
getProjectBuildDirectory() - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
A convenience method that returns a File representing the default Maven build directory.
getSession() - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
Returns the MavenSession in effect.
getTemplateName() - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
Returns the name of the Freemarker template to process.
getTemplateNames(Configuration) - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo

I

isEmpty() - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.ClassModel
Returns false when invoked because a Class as modeled here is never "empty" of its attributes.
isEmpty() - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.LoadableClassesTemplateHashModel
Returns false when invoked to indicate that there are always Class instances that can be loaded.
isSkip() - Method in class org.microbean.freemarker.mojo.FreemarkerMojo
Returns true if an invocation of the execute() method should do nothing.

L

LoadableClassesTemplateHashModel - Class in org.microbean.freemarker
A WrappingTemplateModel and a TemplateHashModel that makes the universe of Class instances that are loadable by a given ClassLoader look like a map.
LoadableClassesTemplateHashModel(ObjectWrapper, ClassLoader) - Constructor for class org.microbean.freemarker.LoadableClassesTemplateHashModel
Creates a new LoadableClassesTemplateHashModel.

O

org.microbean.freemarker - package org.microbean.freemarker
Provides classes and interfaces for working with Freemarker, particularly within the context of a Maven plugin.
org.microbean.freemarker.mojo - package org.microbean.freemarker.mojo
Provides classes and interfaces for adapting Freemarker to Maven's plugin system.
